subject: if symbols that are 180 degree similar are confusing then shouldn't Quickscript/
msgSnippet: Read create new symbols. From my understand the problems with symbols that are similar is a big problem for dyslexics and/or for folks trying to learn a new
messageBody:
Read create new symbols. From my understand the problems with
symbols that are similar is a big problem for dyslexics and/or for
folks trying to learn a new writing system.

thanks for answering. I think now I understand that the Read
Alphabet particularly it's junior version offers all the advantages
of Shavian without (as many at least) it's problems.

Having a computer keyboard that could type Read/Quikscript would be
great along with some type of interactive "course" on a website
(with soundfiles/pictures/flash cards/et. al).

Thanks.

Jesse Heiwa
for an international auxilliary language
www.Esperanto.net

for a phonemic? writing system for global English
The Read/Quikscript system

anyone else in NYC area?

Read create new symbols. From my understand the problems with 
symbols that are similar is a big problem for dyslexics and/or for 
folks trying to learn a new writing system.

thanks for answering. I think now I understand that the Read 
Alphabet particularly it's junior version offers all the advantages 
of Shavian without (as many at least) it's problems.

Having a computer keyboard that could type Read/Quikscript would be 
great along with some type of interactive "course" on a website
